tasks.title: Fix silent error handling in init.go, doctor.go, and search.go
tasks.description: Three places silently discard errors with `_`: init.go:250 discards error from ScanSkillsDirectory, doctor.go:95 discards error from os.ReadFile, search.go:57 discards error from LoadConfig. These should log warnings or return errors to avoid hiding failures.

tasks.title: Remove unused extractor variable in doctor.go
tasks.description: At doctor.go:387-398, an extractor is instantiated but never used, with the warning silenced via `_ = extractor`. Either use it for the intended purpose or remove the dead code.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for internal/github/client.go
tasks.description: The internal/github package has 0% test coverage. client.go (279 LOC) handles GitHub API calls for releases, tags, and archives. Add tests with HTTP test server mocking for key functions.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for internal/core/skill.go
tasks.description: skill.go (431 LOC) handles skill parsing, loading, validation, and indexing with no test coverage. This is core business logic that needs tests for ParseSkillFile, ValidateSkill, ScanSkillsDirectory, and related functions.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for internal/core/auto_tasks.go
tasks.description: auto_tasks.go (213 LOC) manages task state transitions and persistence with no test coverage. Add table-driven tests for task status changes, filtering, and edge cases.

tasks.title: Refactor runDoctor() into smaller helper functions
tasks.description: runDoctor() in doctor.go spans 362 lines (lines 45-407), far exceeding the 50-line guardrail. Extract each health check into separate functions (checkConfig, checkCLAUDEMD, checkSkillsIntegrity, etc.) and extract auto-fix logic into performAutoFix().

tasks.title: Refactor runInit() into smaller helper functions
tasks.description: runInit() in init.go spans 277 lines (lines 41-318), far exceeding the 50-line guardrail. Extract into helper functions: selectTemplate(), selectLanguages(), selectFrameworks(), downloadAndExtract(), and postInitSetup().

tasks.title: Add unit tests for internal/core/downloader.go
tasks.description: downloader.go (262 LOC) handles GitHub archive download and tar extraction with no test coverage. This is critical I/O logic. Add tests using temp directories and mock HTTP responses.

tasks.title: Add unit tests for internal/core/auto_prompt.go
tasks.description: auto_prompt.go (104 LOC) generates prompts for the autonomous AI loop with no test coverage. Add tests for prompt template rendering and edge cases.

tasks.title: Reduce file size of internal/core/skill.go below 300-line limit
tasks.description: skill.go is 431 lines, exceeding the 300-line guardrail for non-test files. Extract skill validation logic into skill_validate.go and/or skill parsing into skill_parse.go to bring each file under the limit.
